Sentencas: Worldwide, research and policy momentum is increasing in the move towards a hydrogen economy.
Titulo: Hydrogen production and utilisation opportunities for Australia

Sentencas: Australia is one of the highest per capita users of energy, but relies heavily on fossil fuels to fulfil its energy requirements-thus making it one of the highest per capita polluters.
Titulo: Hydrogen production and utilisation opportunities for Australia

Sentencas: It is also a country rich in natural resources, giving it the full range of options for a hydrogen economy.
Titulo: Hydrogen production and utilisation opportunities for Australia

Sentencas: With the first Australian Hydrogen Study being completed by the end of 2003, there has as yet been little analysis of the options available to this country specifically.
Titulo: Hydrogen production and utilisation opportunities for Australia

Sentencas: This paper reviews the resources, production and utilisation technology available for a hydrogen economy in Australia, and discusses some of the advantages and disadvantages of the different options.
Titulo: Hydrogen production and utilisation opportunities for Australia

Sentencas: It points out that coal, natural gas, biomass and water are the most promising hydrogen sources at this stage, while solid oxide and molten carbonate fuel cells may hold the advantage in terms of current expertise for utilising hydrogen rich gases for stationary power in Australia.
Titulo: Hydrogen production and utilisation opportunities for Australia
